name: reportburster
description: Server Side Public License (SSPL) - Desktop and Server versions. SSPL terms apply upon distribution or service provision.

scripts.build: npm run electron:serve-tsc && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=6144 ng build --base-href ./ --verbose > build.log
scripts.electron:serve: wait-on tcp:4200 && npm run electron:serve-tsc && electron . --serve --stack_trace_limit=100
scripts.e2e: npm run build:prod && playwright test -c e2e/playwright.config.ts e2e/
scripts.custom:start-server-and-e2e-electron: npm run custom:clean-testground && npx gulp utils:start-server-and-e2e-electron
scripts.custom:start-server-and-e2e-web: npm run custom:clean-testground && npx gulp utils:start-server-and-e2e-web
scripts.custom:compile-and-stage-backend-jars: cd ../../bkend/common && mvn clean install -DskipTests && cd ../reporting && mvn clean install -DskipTests && cd ../../frend/reporting && npx shx cp ../../bkend/common/target/rb-common.jar testground/e2e/lib/burst/rb-common-%npm_package_version%.jar && npx shx cp ../../bkend/reporting/target/*.jar testground/e2e/lib/burst
scripts.custom:compile-and-stage-web-components: npm --prefix ../rb-webcomponents run build && npx shx rm -rf src/assets/web-components/* && npx shx cp -r ../rb-webcomponents/dist/* src/assets/web-components/
scripts.custom:compile-and-stage-web-components-: npm --prefix ../rb-webcomponents run build && npx shx rm -rf testground/grails/grails-app/assets/web-components/* && npx shx mkdir -p testground/grails/grails-app/assets/web-components && npx shx cp -r ../rb-webcomponents/dist/* testground/grails/grails-app/assets/web-components/

npm --prefix ../rb-webcomponents run build && npx shx rm -rf testground/wordpress/wp-plugins/reportburster-integration/assets/js/rb-webcomponents* && npx shx mkdir -p testground/wordpress/wp-plugins/reportburster-integration/assets/js && npx shx cp ../rb-webcomponents/dist/rb-webcomponents.umd.js testground/wordpress/wp-plugins/reportburster-integration/assets/js/
scripts.custom:start-javano-chocono-and-ui: npx gulp e2e-package-javastuff-if-needed && npx gulp utils:start-javano-chocono-and-ui
scripts.custom:start-javano-chocoyes-and-ui: npx gulp e2e-package-javastuff-if-needed && npx gulp utils:start-javano-chocoyes-and-ui
scripts.custom:start-java8-chocono-and-ui: npx gulp e2e-package-javastuff-if-needed && npx gulp utils:start-java8-chocono-and-ui
scripts.custom:start-java8-chocoyes-and-ui: npx gulp e2e-package-javastuff-if-needed && npx gulp utils:start-java8-chocoyes-and-ui
scripts.custom:start-java17-chocono-and-ui: npx gulp e2e-package-javastuff-if-needed && npx gulp utils:start-java17-chocono-and-ui
scripts.custom:start-java17-chocoyes-and-ui: npx gulp e2e-package-javastuff-if-needed && npx gulp utils:start-java17-chocoyes-and-ui
scripts.custom:clean-output: rimraf dist && rimraf release && rimraf testground
scripts.precustom:icons-iconmaker: ie4uinit.exe -ClearIconCache && ie4uinit.exe -show && rimraf testground/fontawesome2png && font-awesome-svg-png --icons paper-plane-o --color steelblue --sizes 1024 --dest testground/fontawesome2png
scripts.custom:test-upgrade: rimraf testground/upgrade && cross-env PORTABLE_EXECUTABLE_DIR=testground/upgrade SHOULD_SEND_STATS=false ts-node --project e2e/tsconfig.e2e.json node_modules/jasmine/bin/jasmine --config=scripts-dev/jasmine/jasmine-updater-all.json
scripts.precustom:release-electron: npm run custom:compile-and-stage-web-components && npm run custom:clean-output && npm prune --force
scripts.custom:e2e-prepare-letmeupdate-for-manua: custom:clean-testground && npx gulp e2e-package-javastuff-if-needed && cross-env PORTABLE_EXECUTABLE_DIR=testground/upgrade SHOULD_SEND_STATS=false ts-node --project e2e/tsconfig.e2e.json node_modules/jasmine/bin/jasmine --config=scripts-dev/jasmine/jasmine-updater-letme.json && npx gulp e2e-copy-dbexe-to-letme-baseline
scripts.custom:e2e-prepare-updatenow-for-manual-: custom:clean-testground && npx gulp e2e-package-javastuff-if-needed && cross-env PORTABLE_EXECUTABLE_DIR=testground/upgrade SHOULD_SEND_STATS=false ts-node node_modules/jasmine/bin/jasmine --config=scripts-dev/jasmine/jasmine-updater-now.json && npx gulp e2e-prepare-updatenow-for-manual-testing
scripts._custom:e2e-generate-let-me-update-basel: rimraf testground && mkdirp testground/upgrade && cross-env PORTABLE_EXECUTABLE_DIR=testground/upgrade ts-node --project e2e/tsconfig.e2e-baseline.json e2e/utils/baseline.ts
scripts._custom:ng:serve:electron: cross-env TARGET=electron NODE_ENV=development NG_DEBUG=verbose ng serve --verbose
scripts._custom:debug:electron: cross-env TARGET=electron NG_VERBOSE=true DEBUG=* ng serve --verbose
scripts._custom:start-server: npx gulp e2e-package-javastuff-if-needed && npm run custom:compile-and-stage-backend-jars && npm run _custom:compile-server && cd ../../bkend/server && mvn spring-boot:run -Dspring-boot.run.arguments='-serve' -Dspring-boot.run.jvmArguments="-Dorg.springframework.boot.logging.LoggingSystem=org.springframework.boot.logging.log4j2.Log4J2LoggingSystem -DPORTABLE_EXECUTABLE_DIR=../../frend/reporting/testground/e2e -Dserver.port=9090"
scripts._custom:start-ui-electron: cross-env NG_DEBUG=true ENABLE_DEVELOPMENT_FEATURES=true PORTABLE_EXECUTABLE_DIR=testground/e2e npm-run-all -p _custom:ng:serve:electron electron:serve
scripts._custom:playwright-scripts-electron: npm run build:prod && cross-env TEST_ENV=electron TEST_LICENSE_KEY=51b0aa18f2bbc066efdca8b53c2dacc8 RUNNING_IN_E2E=true PORTABLE_EXECUTABLE_DIR=testground/e2e playwright test -c e2e/playwright.config.ts e2e/
scripts._custom:playwright-tests-web: wait-on tcp:4201 && cross-env TEST_ENV=web TEST_LICENSE_KEY=51b0aa18f2bbc066efdca8b53c2dacc8 RUNNING_IN_E2E=true PORTABLE_EXECUTABLE_DIR=testground/e2e playwright test -c e2e/playwright.config.ts e2e/
